title: The Latest: Royals win Game 6, return to World Series
text: Royals Stand On World Series Precipice 00:43 With one more win, relentless Kansas City Royals will have a chance to show off their power in a return trip to the World Series. With Ben Zorborist they showed they can play home run derby, too.Zobrist hit a two-run homer on knuckleballer R.A. Dickey’s fourth pitch of the game, Alex Rios connected... Recent related news Lorenzo Cain sprinted home from first base on Eric Hosmer's single in the eighth inning, Wade Davis weathered a 45-minute rain delay and a white-knuckle ninth,... MyNorthwest.com 3 minutes ago - Sports Royals win the pennant after beating the Toronto Blue Jays, 4-3, in Game 6 of the ALCS. They led the playoff series 3-2 before Friday’s game. Wall Street Journal 11 minutes ago - Sports Royals win Game 6 thriller, back in World Series CBS Sports 18 minutes ago - Sports The Royals would go on to earn a 4-3 rain-delayed victory over the Blue Jays to win the hotly-contest best-of-seven game American League Championship Series 4-2 Globe and Mail 21 minutes ago - Sports The latest on the AL Championship Series. The Blue Jays won Game 5 to force the series back to Kansas City, where the Royals still lead 3-2. The Mets await the... Business Insider 2 hours ago - Business The Mets win Game 4 to sweep the Cubs in the NLCS and earn a spot in the World Series. FOX Sports 2 days ago - Sports
